skill.name: skill-builder
skill.description: Interactive skill creation assistant that guides users through building new Agent Skills for Claude Code. Use when creating new skills, building custom capabilities, or when the user runs /new-skill command. Helps design skill structure, craft descriptions, create scripts, and organize supporting files.
skill.summary: Interactive skill creation assistant for building Claude Code Agent Skills
skill.author: 0xRaduan

security_audit.summary: All static findings are false positives. The detected patterns (eval, shell commands, hidden file access) are in documentation files (REFERENCE.md, SKILL.md) that explain skill development concepts. The skill-builder is a legitimate tool for scaffolding Claude Code skills using template-based code generation. No malicious intent or actual security risks found.

low_findings.title: Hardcoded URL in documentation
low_findings.description: Documentation files contain hardcoded URL references. These are standard documentation links, not data exfiltration endpoints.

content.value_statement: Users struggle to create new Agent Skills for Claude Code due to unclear structure requirements. This skill provides an interactive guided workflow that scaffolds skill files, generates valid JSON schemas, and produces production-ready skill templates.
actual_capabilities: Guides users through interactive skill creation workflow with prompts
Scaffolds complete skill directory structure with required files
Generates valid skill-report.json with security audit and content fields
Creates SKILL.md documentation with usage instructions and examples
Produces REFERENCE.md with implementation details and code examples
limitations: Does not execute user code or install dependencies automatically
Limited to local skill development, cannot publish to remote registries
Does not validate external API keys or credentials
Skill templates are fixed, cannot customize beyond provided options

use_cases.title: Create a new productivity skill
use_cases.description: A developer wants to build a custom skill for automating daily standup updates. The skill-builder walks them through defining the skill name, description, supported tools, and generates the complete skill structure with working templates.
use_cases.target_user: Software developers building custom Claude Code capabilities

use_cases.title: Generate skill documentation
use_cases.description: A user has written a skill but needs proper SKILL.md documentation. The skill-builder generates professional documentation with prompt templates, use cases, FAQs, and output examples.

use_cases.title: Learn skill development patterns
use_cases.description: A new Claude Code user wants to understand how skills are structured. The skill-builder creates example skills that serve as learning templates showing proper file organization and content requirements.
use_cases.target_user: Claude Code beginners learning skill development

prompt_templates.title: Create a basic skill
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me create a new skill called [skill-name] that helps with [task-description]. Use the skill-builder to scaffold the complete structure.
prompt_templates.scenario: Starting a new skill project from scratch

prompt_templates.title: Generate skill documentation
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate SKILL.md documentation for my existing skill. The skill provides [capability-description] and uses [tools-list].
prompt_templates.scenario: Adding documentation to an existing skill

prompt_templates.title: Create a complex multi-file skill
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a comprehensive skill with multiple prompt templates, use cases, and security audit documentation. The skill should handle [complex-workflow-description].
prompt_templates.scenario: Creating an advanced skill with full marketplace metadata

prompt_templates.title: Clone and modify an existing skill
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the skill-builder to create a new skill based on my specifications. I need a [skill-type] skill for [use-case] with support for [tools].
prompt_templates.scenario: Customizing skill generation for specific requirements

output_examples.input: Create a skill for generating commit messages from git diffs
Build a skill that summarizes Pull Request changes
output: - SKILL.md (with prompt templates for PR analysis)
Configure supported tools in skill config

best_practices: Use the skill-builder when starting any new skill to ensure proper structure and complete metadata
Review the generated SKILL.md and customize the prompt templates for your specific use case
Run security audits on generated skills before publishing to ensure safe tool usage
anti_patterns: Using the skill-builder for one-off scripts that do not need full skill structure
Skipping the security audit section when publishing skills to the marketplace
Modifying generated files manually without understanding the skill schema requirements

faq.question: What files does the skill-builder create?
faq.answer: The skill-builder creates three essential files: SKILL.md (documentation with usage instructions), REFERENCE.md (implementation details), and skill-report.json (marketplace metadata with security audit).

faq.question: Can I modify the generated templates?
faq.answer: Yes, all generated files are plain Markdown and JSON. You can edit them freely after generation to customize the skill for your needs.

faq.question: Does the skill-builder execute code?
faq.answer: No, the skill-builder only generates files and provides guidance. It does not install dependencies, execute scripts, or make network requests.

faq.question: How do I publish a generated skill?
faq.answer: After generating the skill, review the skill-report.json for completeness, ensure the security audit passes, and follow the standard Claude Code skill publication process.

faq.question: What tools can my skill support?
faq.answer: Generated skills can support claude, codex, and claude-code tools. The skill-builder helps you configure which tools are available based on your skill's purpose.

faq.question: Can I create skills for others to use?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill-builder produces complete, publishable skills with proper documentation. Share the generated skill files so others can install and use them with Claude Code.
